thread.title: Rams’ soccer, football postponed until Monday
thread.title_full: Rams’ soccer, football postponed until Monday

author: Dave Stewart
title: Rams’ soccer, football postponed until Monday
text: Your Health Rams’ soccer, football postponed until Monday By Dave Stewart on October 2, 2015 in FCIAC , High School Sports , Sports , Sports Lead , Sports Schedule · 0 Comments The New Canaan Rams’ boys soccer and football games scheduled for Friday have been postponed to Monday due to stormy weather. In boys soccer, New Canaan (2-4-2) will face the Ridgefield Tigers (2-3-2) at 4 p.m., Monday, at Conner Field. In football, New Canaan (2-0) will take on the Westhill Vikings (1-1) at 5:30 p.m., Monday, at Dunning Field. Both the Rams and Vikings have byes next weekend, making the move to Monday possible.
